channel.title: Changeing The World Map!
channel.description:
So, This might sound crazy.
Me and a friend want to change the runescape map. Adding custom area's, removing builings, adding onto area's ect. Does anyone know anything about this? If you could give links & Advice. Thanks alot. Z-Codez

item.title: Changeing The World Map!
item.dc:creator: @Halflingblade Halflingblade
item.description:
@Halflingblade wrote:

All I did was search google and typed “Rune Server Map Editor” and found it on the dot.

Read full topic

item.title: Changeing The World Map!
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Halflingblade:

I don’t think I have the right cache version to do it with. I finally got it to load the cache but when I log into the game it just freezes upon vision.

Maybe built for one cache - I’m sure it wouldn’t support 508+ (if you have the maps for a 508) but then again I have no idea how it works.

Just curious, could you link me directly, please?

Read full topic

item.title: Changeing The World Map!
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Sometimes they already have mapdata loaded in to the program. Did you specifically load your cache up? Does it rebuild/repack the cache?

Read full topic

item.title: Changeing The World Map!
item.dc:creator: @Halflingblade Halflingblade
item.description:
@Halflingblade wrote:

Alright I got it working, I started changing the map and I saved and replaced my cache with my original, no luck. Nothing changed. I don’t know what I’m doing wrong because I’ve never done this before, I hope someone can help.

Read full topic

item.title: Changeing The World Map!
item.dc:creator: @Z-Codez Z-Codez
item.description:
@Z-Codez wrote:

Mendorphins; Thanks for that alot of help! ;D
Halflingblade; Goodluck mate. message me when you start changeing map!
Also could any of you gimme links?
thanks
Z

Read full topic

item.title: Changeing The World Map!
item.dc:creator: @Halflingblade Halflingblade
item.description:
@Halflingblade wrote:

I’ve been searching the same thing, just found it on R-S. Downloading it right now, is it complicated to use?

Read full topic

item.title: Changeing The World Map!
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

There’s a map editor on Rune_Server I think, not sure if it has been released or not? But that’s what you need. Also, in Tom’s Cache Editor, you can load up maps via one of the JARs and I think you can edit the maps and save them (I just don’t know how to use it).

Read full topic
